Description:
Position Title:             BD/Digital Marketing ExecutiveEmployment Type:     Full TimeSalary:                        up to 7K AED all-inclusive, depending on experience and qualificationsJob Location:             Dubai, UAE About the Client:A Leading Engineering and MEP Contracting Company in UAE Job Description:Contact prospects and cold leads to offer company’s services
Researching prospective accounts in target markets & post and share an update on the company's LinkedIn profile
Handles registration & prequalification as contractor/supplier
Proactively initiate and follow up with prospective clients for project inquiries or quotations over the phone and email
Develop, implement, and manage marketing campaigns specifically Google Ads & SEO to promote company’s servicesSkills
Skills:
Open to Filipino and Arabic nationals
45 years old and below
Must have a Bachelor’s degree
At least 3 years of of experience in the same role
Must have an extensive background & knowledge in developing, implementing & managing marketing campaigns specifically Google Ads & SEO
Immediate joiners will be prioritized
